title: Slam - Nick Hornby
description:
Bestselling author Nick Hornby delivers his first novel for young adults.

About the Author

The New Yorker calls bestselling author Nick Hornby Ã¢â‚¬Å“the maestro of the male confessional.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ He is the author of the novels A Long Way Down, How to Be Good, High Fidelity, and About a Boy, and the memoir Fever Pitch.
